verses.verse: Then we turned, <WH6437> and went up <WH5927> the way <WH1870> to Bashan: <WH1316> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> us, <WH5971> he and all his people, to battle <WH4421> at Edrei. <WH154>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH3372> "Don't fear him; <WH5414> for I have delivered him, <WH5971> and all his people, and his land, <WH776> into your hand; <WH3027> and you shall do <WH6213> to him as you did <WH6213> to Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who lived <WH3427> at Heshbon. <WH2809>"

So Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> into our hand <WH3027> Og <WH5747> also, <WH4428> the king of Bashan, <WH1316> and all his people: <WH5971> and we struck <WH5221> him until none was left <WH7604> to him remaining. <WH8300>

We took <WH3920> all his cities <WH5892> at that time; <WH6256> there was not a city <WH7151> which we didn't <WH3947> take from them; <WH8346> sixty cities, <WH5892> all the region <WH2256> of Argob, <WH709> the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan. <WH1316>
All these were cities <WH5892> fortified <WH1219> with high <WH1364> walls, <WH2346> gates, <WH1817> and bars; <WH1280> besides the unwalled <WH6521> towns <WH5892> a great <WH3966> many. <WH7235>

We utterly destroyed <WH2763> them, <WH6213> as we did to Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> utterly destroying <WH2763> every inhabited <WH4962> city, <WH5892> with the women <WH802> and the little ones. <WH2945>
But all the livestock, <WH929> and the spoil <WH7998> of the cities, <WH5892> we took for a prey to ourselves. <WH962>

We took <WH3947> the land <WH776> at that time <WH6256> out <WH3947> of the hand <WH3027> of the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> who were beyond <WH5676> the Jordan, <WH3383> from the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon <WH769> to Mount <WH2022> Hermon. <WH2768>
(The Sidonians <WH6722> call <WH7121> Hermon <WH2768> Sirion, <WH8303> and the Amorites <WH567> call <WH7121> it Senir. <WH8149>)

We took all the cities <WH5892> of the plain, <WH4334> and all Gilead, <WH1568> and all Bashan, <WH1316> to Salecah <WH5548> and Edrei, <WH154> cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan. <WH1316>

(For only Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> remained <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of the Rephaim; <WH7497> behold, <WH6210> his bedstead was a bedstead <WH6210> of iron; <WH1270> isn't <WH3808> it in Rabbah <WH7237> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon? <WH5983> nine <WH8672> cubits <WH520> was its length, <WH753> and four <WH702> cubits <WH520> its breadth, <WH7341> after the cubit <WH520> of a man. <WH376>)

This land <WH776> we took in possession <WH3423> at that time: <WH6256> from Aroer, <WH6177> which is by the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon, <WH769> and half <WH2677> the hill <WH2022> country of Gilead, <WH1568> and its cities, <WH5892> gave <WH5414> I to the Reubenites <WH7206> and to the Gadites: <WH1425>

and the rest <WH3499> of Gilead, <WH1568> and all Bashan, <WH1316> the kingdom <WH4467> of Og, <WH5747> gave <WH5414> I to the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh; <WH4519> all the region <WH2256> of Argob, <WH709> even all Bashan. <WH1316> (The same <WH1931> is called <WH7121> the land <WH776> of Rephaim. <WH7497>

Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> took <WH3947> all the region <WH2256> of Argob, <WH709> to the border <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and the Maacathites, <WH4602> and called <WH7121> them, <WH1316> even Bashan, after his own name, <WH8034> Havvoth Jair, <WH3117> to this day.)
I gave <WH5414> Gilead <WH1568> to Machir. <WH4353>

To the Reubenites <WH7206> and to the Gadites <WH1425> I gave <WH5414> from Gilead <WH1568> even to the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon, <WH769> the middle <WH8432> of the valley, <WH5158> and its border, <WH1366> even to the river <WH5158> Jabbok, <WH2999> which is the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983>

the Arabah <WH6160> also, <WH3383> and the Jordan and its border, <WH1366> from Chinnereth <WH3672> even to the sea <WH3220> of the Arabah, <WH6160> the Salt <WH4417> Sea, <WH3220> under the slopes of Pisgah <WH798> eastward. <WH4217>

I commanded <WH6680> you at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> "Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has given <WH5414> you this land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it: <WH5674> you shall pass over armed <WH2502> before <WH6440> your brothers <WH251> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> all the men <WH1121> of valor. <WH2428>

But your wives, <WH802> and your little ones, <WH2945> and your livestock, <WH4735> (I know <WH3045> that you have much <WH7227> livestock <WH4735>), shall live <WH3427> in your cities <WH5892> which I have given you, <WH5414>

until Yahweh <WH3068> gives rest <WH5117> to your brothers, <WH251> as to you, <WH3423> and they also possess the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> them beyond <WH5676> the Jordan: <WH3383> then you shall return <WH7725> every man <WH376> to his possession, <WH3425> which I have given you. <WH5414>"

I commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091> at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> "Your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all that Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has done <WH6213> to these two <WH8147> kings: <WH4428> so shall Yahweh <WH3068> do <WH6213> to all the kingdoms <WH4467> where you go over. <WH5674>
You shall not fear <WH3372> them; <WH3068> for Yahweh your God, <WH430> he it is who fights for you. <WH3898>"
I begged <WH2603> Yahweh <WH3068> at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559>

"Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> you have begun <WH2490> to show <WH7200> your servant <WH5650> your greatness, <WH1433> and your strong <WH2389> hand: <WH3027> for what god <WH410> is there in heaven <WH8064> or in earth, <WH776> that can do <WH6213> according to your works, <WH4639> and according to your mighty acts? <WH1369>
Please let me go over <WH5674> and see <WH7200> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> that is beyond <WH5676> the Jordan, <WH3383> that goodly <WH2896> mountain, <WH2022> and Lebanon. <WH3844>"

But Yahweh <WH3068> was angry <WH5674> with me for your sakes, <WH8085> and didn't listen to me; <WH3068> and Yahweh said <WH559> to me, <WH7227> "Let it suffice you; <WH1696> speak no more <WH3254> to me of this matter. <WH1697>

Go up <WH5927> to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah, <WH6449> and lift up <WH5375> your eyes <WH5869> westward, <WH3220> and northward, <WH6828> and southward, <WH8486> and eastward, <WH4217> and see <WH7200> with your eyes: <WH5869> for you shall not go over <WH5674> this Jordan. <WH3383>

But commission <WH6680> Joshua, <WH3091> and encourage <WH2388> him, <WH553> and strengthen him; <WH5674> for he shall go over before <WH6440> this people, <WH5971> and he shall cause them to inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> which you shall see. <WH7200>"
So we stayed <WH3427> in the valley <WH1516> over against <WH4136> Beth Peor. <WH1047>
